TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpCapabilitiesSectionHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: 帮助读取配置文件的 节，并帮助创建包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 类的实例。

span.span: Assists in reading in the section of a configuration file and creating an instance of the class that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和相应``.NET Framework 2.0 版中已弃用配置节。The class and the corresponding `` configuration section have been deprecated in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 用于管理浏览器功能的首选的方法是通过以供编译的浏览器定义文件类。The preferred method for managing browser capabilities is through browser definition files that are compiled for use by the class. 两种配置方法的目标是生成的实例从可以访问的类属性类。The goal of both configuration methodologies is to generate an instance of the class that can be accessed from the property of the class. 使用浏览器定义文件来存储浏览器功能提供了超过替代项的优势。Using the browser definition files to store browser capabilities affords advantages over the alternative. 它提供改进的性能，因为从 XML 配置文件分析和编译为提前类浏览器定义信息。It offers improved performance because the browser definition information is parsed from the XML configuration file and compiled into a class ahead of time. 浏览器定义文件也是易于维护的：The browser definition files are also easier to maintain: - 定义是分层的并因此不太正则表达式来确定的浏览器功能依赖。The definitions are hierarchical, and thus rely less on regular expressions to determine the browser capabilities. - 定义可以组织在多个文件，使它们更易于管理。The definitions can be organized in multiple files, making them easier to manage. - 定义可以在任何级别，在 Machine.config 级别或特定应用程序级别定义。The definitions can be defined at any level, either at the Machine.config level or a specific application level. 这消除了需要复制整个组用于重写特定浏览器的功能的定义。This eliminates the need to copy the entire set of definitions for the purpose of overriding the capabilities for a specific browser.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Create (object parent, object configurationContext, System.Xml.XmlNode section);

public: virtual System::Object ^ Create(System::Object ^ parent, System::Object ^ configurationContext, System::Xml::XmlNode ^ section);

param.name: configurationContext
param.span: 当前配置文件的配置上下文。

span.span: The configuration context of the current configuration file.

param.name: section
param.span: 配置文件中包含信息的节。

span.span: The section of the configuration file that contains the information.

summary.span: 创建包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 类的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

returns.span: 包含客户端浏览器功能信息的 的实例。

span.span: An instance of that contains the capabilities information for the client browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类派生自从其浏览器定义数据``配置节。This class derives its browser definition data from the `` configuration section. 本部分.NET Framework 2.0 版中已弃用。This section is deprecated in the .NET Framework version 2.0.
